mapper.select: select g.*,mg.stock_count, mg.start_date,mg.end_date,mg.miaosha_price from miaosha_goods mg left join goods g on mg.goods_id = g.id
select g.*,mg.stock_count, mg.start_date,mg.end_date,mg.miaosha_price from miaosha_goods mg left join goods g on mg.goods_id = g.id where mg.goods_id=#{goodsId}
mapper.update: update miaosha_goods set stock_count = stock_count-1 where goods_id=#{goodsId} and stock_count>0
